au.cost: AUD 25/month for Kayo Sports, varies for Foxtel packages, Free for 7plus, AUD 4.99/week for AFL Live Pass
au.restrictions: 7plus only shows select games for free
au.additionalInfo: Kayo Sports and Foxtel show all AFL games live. 7plus broadcasts up to 4 games per round for free.

us.additionalInfo: Watch AFL provides live streaming and on-demand replays of all AFL games.

gb.additionalInfo: Watch AFL provides live streaming and on-demand replays of all AFL games.

ca.additionalInfo: Watch AFL provides live streaming and on-demand replays of all AFL games.

nz.cost: Varies for Sky Sport packages, NZD 25/month for Watch AFL
nz.restrictions: Sky Sport may not show all games
nz.additionalInfo: Sky Sport shows select AFL games. Watch AFL provides complete coverage.

ie.additionalInfo: Watch AFL provides live streaming and on-demand replays of all AFL games.
